title: [1.7.10]Seafloor survival半自由模式海底之生存整合包
txt_content:
本帖最后由 3466267730 于 2020-5-29 13:40 编辑 

同创列表（多人创作）
最初构思人员名字(mcbbs昵称)：3466267730
安装mods人员：qaz709
海底生存地图制作人员：3466267730
测试人员：qaz709
发布人员：3466267730mods列表加速火把:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=615324小地图:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=363958等价交换:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=456675匠魂:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=661201精英怪:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=592395连锁挖矿:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-387183-1-1.html血量显示:http://www.mcmap.cc/Minecraft/mod/1710/4642.htmlfsffff更好的熔炉:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=350131f自定义树苗:http://www.mcmap.cc/plus/dlsoft-2079-2.htmlG键合成表:http://www.mcmap.cc/minecraft/mod/1710/149.html分解台:http://www.mcmap.cc/Minecraft/mod/1710/3230.html更好的建筑魔杖:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=579351腐肉烧皮革:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=212911海洋世界:http://www.kuaihou.com/soft/136297.html装备耐久:http://www.3h3.com/patch/29344.html无中生有:https://www.secretmine.net/az/753.html工业2:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=138244工业2实验版:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=289528龙之研究:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=373121藩马斯丰收工艺：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=6698563D物品:http://www.mcmap.cc/Minecraft/mod/1710/4766.html锤子:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=528334电力时代:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=612801多维度矿石:https://www.secretmine.net/25420.html开源方块:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=329114植物加速生长:https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-329571-1-1.html



简介
你需要用房子里的这一棵树开始你的生存
任务：做一个刷怪塔
一个刷铁塔
养羊、牛、鸡、猪等动物
打败末影龙

整合包中海洋里会出现一些其他生物
你可以试着养一些螃蟹、鱼等生物

最后
下载地址：https://pan.baidu.com/s/13a512Ws2IDU61nvv94rJzQ
提取码：32oj

以知bug：死亡后出生会在房子外面，作者发现是个bug调不好，所以请自行游回去。
